name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky - Kizuna
summary:
A mobile game based on The Legend of Heroes: Trails series with 128 characters from the 3 Trails in the Sky games , Zero no Kiseki, Ao no Kiseki, and the 3 Trails of Cold Steel games. 
The characters can be collected as cards with star ratings that are used in battles against monsters or other players teams.
